original_title: 封印映像17 けもの霊
overview: The 17th installment in the "Sealed Videos" series, investigating the truly dreadful in horror videos.  Such as a shelved TV program on voyeur enthusiasts, which encounter problems during recording.  Spiritism -- Mystery -- Cruelty -- Crime -- Another volume packed with horor videos, that were never meant to be released to the public.
title: Sealed Video 17: Beast Spirit
